meanings: 카지노용어 럭, ‘레이디 럭(lady luck)’이라고도 한다. (→luck out)
행운을 가져올 수 있도록[전통적인 믿음이 그러하니]

vlive.korean: "대학에서 파이팅 빈다 맥신"? 이게 뭐지? "I wish you good luck at the University, Maxin". What does that mean? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 기오브
vlive.english: "I wish you good luck at the University, Maxin". What does that mean?

vlive.korean: 범규 형 지금 운이... His luck just... 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 코너 하나 뺏었습니다

examples.korean: He ascribed his failure to bad luck. 발음듣기 그는 실패를 불운 탓으로 돌렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He ascribed his failure to bad luck. 발음

examples.korean: Unhappily, such good luck is rare. 발음듣기 불행히도 그런 행운은 드물다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Unhappily, such good luck is rare. 발음

examples.korean: She seems cursed with bad luck. 발음듣기 그녀는 계속 운이 안 좋은 것 같다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She seems cursed with bad luck. 발음

examples.korean: His luck is on the turn. 발음듣기 그의 운수가 곧 바뀌려고 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His luck is on the turn. 발음

examples.korean: ‘Oh well, better luck next time,’ she sighed. 발음듣기 “뭐 저, 다음번에는 운이 더 좋겠지.” 그녀가 한숨을 쉬며 말했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Oh well, better luck next time,’ she sighed. 발음
